cyclone.name: ERIN
cyclone.current_location: about 315 mi SE of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: expected to turn north then accelerate northeastward away from the U.S. East Coast toward Atlantic Canada

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Off-shore waters from the north-central Bahamas to Atlantic Canada; highest U.S. exposure is well east of the Outer Banks
weather_observation.wind: Only occasional breezy conditions possible as the system passes more than 200 nm offshore.
weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated showers; heavy rainfall not expected at the port.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and strong rip currents along Virginia beaches may affect small-craft operations.
